decks.notes: The deck revolves around using Amulet of Vigor to untap lands and generate mana quickly, allowing the player to ramp into Primeval Titan and search for powerful land cards like Urza's Saga or Lotus Field. It aims to quickly assemble the pieces needed for a strong combo finish, such as using Scapeshift to search for multiple lands and win the game in one turn. The deck also includes various utility lands to provide additional benefits and flexibility in different situations. Overall, the key concept is to efficiently ramp into big threats and quickly close out the game with powerful combos.

The deck focuses on utilizing cards with the Cascade mechanic to cascade into Crashing Footfalls, allowing for a quick swarm of tokens to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes powerful, high-cost creatures like Scion of Draco and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to further pressure the opponent. By controlling the board with cards like Subtlety and Leyline Binding, the deck aims to maintain board presence and push for a quick victory through aggressive tactics and overwhelming the opponent with a flurry of creatures.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on using low-cost creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck includes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge to deal damage directly to the opponent or their creatures. Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer provide card advantage and board presence. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory boost the team's power and toughness. The deck aims to be aggressive and fast, putting pressure on the opponent early on while maintaining control of the board with cards like Static Prison.

This deck aims to control the game through a combination of removal spells, counter magic, and powerful creatures. By disrupting the opponent's strategy and efficiently dealing with threats, the deck seeks to maintain board control and outvalue the opponent in the long game. It utilizes powerful planeswalkers and versatile spells to stay ahead in card advantage and keep the opponent on the back foot. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent access to all colors while minimizing the risk of being mana screwed.

This aggro deck focuses on quickly playing powerful creatures and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive attacks. The deck includes a mix of land cards to ensure mana stability, alongside a variety of creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Scion of Draco that pack a punch. Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact help support the creatures and provide additional benefits. Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames offer direct damage to control the board, while Stubborn Denial provides protection against removal spells. Overall, this deck aims to secure victory through fast and relentless aggression.

The deck focuses on utilizing Eldrazi creatures to aggressively control the board and overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Eldrazi Linebreaker, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while applying pressure with powerful creatures like Sire of Seven Deaths and It That Heralds the End. The inclusion of cards like All Is Dust and Kozilek's Command allows for additional board control and disruption. The deck's mana base is optimized for casting Eldrazi creatures efficiently, allowing for a powerful early game presence and the ability to quickly close out the game.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures that disrupt the opponent's game plan, forcing them to pay additional costs for their spells or creatures, while also having the ability to exile threats from the graveyard. With a mix of removal spells and creatures with powerful abilities, the deck aims to control the board and pressure the opponent to make unfavorable plays. The combination of creatures with disruptive abilities and removal spells allows the deck to stay ahead in tempo and build towards a powerful endgame.

The main concept of this deck is to play aggressively with low-cost creatures and spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By utilizing cards like Lava Dart, Lightning Bolt, and Monastery Swiftspear, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration help to maintain card advantage and ensure that the deck can consistently draw into its powerful threats. Overall, the deck focuses on swift and efficient aggression to secure victory in a fast-paced Modern 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on utilizing fast, aggressive Eldrazi creatures to overwhelm the opponent while disrupting their plays with cards like Kozilek's Command and Chalice of the Void. The Eldrazi Linebreaker and Sire of Seven Deaths provide strong offensive threats, while Thought-Knot Seer disrupts the opponent's hand. The deck is built around Eldrazi synergy and mana acceleration, allowing for powerful plays early in the game. With a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, this deck aims to quickly take control of the game and dominate the battlefield.

The deck focuses on using spells with a high storm count to generate a massive amount of mana and then cast a lethal Grapeshot to finish off the opponent. The deck includes cards like Pyretic Ritual, Desperate Ritual, and Reckless Impulse to quickly generate mana, while cards like Manamorphose and Wrenn's Resolve help dig for combo pieces. Ral, Monsoon Mage and Ruby Medallion help reduce the cost of spells, making it easier to reach a high storm count. The deck also includes Past in Flames for recursion and Wish for additional flexibility in finding combo pieces.

This combo deck centers around creating a powerful board presence through synergies with creatures like Basking Broodscale and Glaring Fleshraker, supported by equipments like Blade of the Bloodchief. Eldrazi creatures and artifacts like Walking Ballista provide additional utility and threat. The use of Urza's Saga and Ancient Stirrings help find key pieces of the combo, while support cards like Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command provide disruption and removal. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful battlefield presence.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through counterspells, hand disruption, and removal spells. It aims to control the game by denying the opponent's key cards while slowly building up advantage through powerful creatures like Murktide Regent and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares. The deck also includes card draw and graveyard interaction to maintain consistency and outvalue the opponent. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure the deck can cast its spells efficiently while also providing access to a variety of colors for flexibility in gameplay.

This deck focuses on playing multiple colors to utilize powerful cards that benefit from having different colors of mana available. It aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Territorial Kavu, Scion of Draco, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer while also controlling the board with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide additional support to protect and enhance your creatures. The deck also includes some land destruction with Tribal Flames and Consign to Memory, ensuring your opponent struggles to keep up with your aggressive plays.

The Mardu Aggro deck focuses on using a mix of aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to apply early pressure, while also including removal spells like Fatal Push and Galvanic Discharge to clear the way for attacks. Sephiroth, Fabled SOLDIER and Ocelot Pride provide additional threats and utility, making it a versatile and fast-paced deck that aims to race ahead and secure victory before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creature and spell plays. By utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, the deck can quickly put pressure on the opponent while controlling the board with cards like Goblin Bombardment and Static Prison. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah to secure victory. With a focus on fast, efficient plays and powerful creatures, this deck aims to win the game swiftly and decisively.

The deck focuses on assembling a combo involving Basking Broodscale and Blade of the Bloodchief to generate a powerful board presence. It relies on disruptive elements like Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command to control the game while setting up the combo. The inclusion of Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End provides additional threats, with support from cards like Urza's Saga and Ancient Stirrings for consistency. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, ultimately leading to a victory through a well-timed combo.
